remarks: Value of a univariate polynomial evaluation mapping a multiple of an exponentiation of a variable to the multiple of the exponentiation of the evaluated variable.  (Contributed by AV, 18-Sep-2019.)
statement:
evl1varpw.q $e |- Q = ( eval1 ` R ) $.
evl1varpw.w $e |- W = ( Poly1 ` R ) $.
evl1varpw.g $e |- G = ( mulGrp ` W ) $.
evl1varpw.x $e |- X = ( var1 ` R ) $.
evl1varpw.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
evl1varpw.e $e |- .^ = ( .g ` G ) $.
evl1varpw.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. CRing ) $.
evl1varpw.n $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN0 ) $.
evl1scvarpw.t1 $e |- .X. = ( .s ` W ) $.
evl1scvarpw.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. B ) $.
evl1scvarpwval.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. B ) $.
evl1scvarpwval.h $e |- H = ( mulGrp ` R ) $.
evl1scvarpwval.e $e |- E = ( .g ` H ) $.
evl1scvarpwval.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
evl1scvarpwval $p |- ( ph -> ( ( Q ` ( A .X. ( N .^ X ) ) ) ` C ) = ( A .x. ( N E C ) ) ) $.
